summary.para: Receives messages from a menu band object.

param.name: psmd
param.para: A pointer to a structure that contains information about the menu.

param.name: uMsg
param.para: A message ID. This will be one of the SMC_XXX values. See Shell Messages and Notifications for a complete list.

param.name: wParam
param.para: A WPARAM value that contains additional information. See the specific SMC_XXX message reference for details.

param.name: lParam
param.para: An LPARAM value that contains additional information. See the specific SMC_XXX message reference for details.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: A callback interface that exposes a method that receives messages from a menu band.

remarks.para: Once you have created the menu band object, pass a pointer to this interface to the menu band object by calling . You receive messages from the menu band through the method.
